column1: #text=Last time I was at the stylist , I made an appointment for today .
#text=I arrived about 10 minutes before my appointment , to make sure that I would n't be late .
#text=When I walked in , the lady behind the counter greeted me , and asked if I would like something to drink .
#text=I said no , that I would not .
#text=I then had a seat and waited for my stylist to come and collect me .
#text=After a few minutes the stylist came out and led me back to the area where I would be getting my hair cut .
#text=First we washed my hair , then she seated me in a chair that is designed for hair cutting .
#text=The stylist asked me what type of haircut I wanted , I told her , and she began to cut .
#text=First she clipped the sides and back , then she used scissors to trim the top and front .
#text=After she was done she used a blow dryer to blow off all the hair she had cut .
#text=She then brushed my shoulders with a special hair brush , and I was done .
